friendlySyntax.title: Friendly Syntax
friendlySyntax.description: RowScript reuses most of the JavaScript syntax for friendliness, also influenced by other languages like TypeScript, Rust and Python.

powerfulTypeSystem.title: Super Powerful Type System
powerfulTypeSystem.description: Language features like dependent types, OOP, traits and more are all supported.

fastCompile.title: Fast to Compile
fastCompile.description: RowScript compiler is written in Rust programming language and shipped via native binaries, it's stunningly fast.
